meanings.definition: A robot with a human appearance.
meanings.sent1: The android walked among the humans, looking just like them.
meanings.sent2: I saw an android at the science fiction convention.
meanings.sent3: The android tried to blend in at the costume party, but everyone knew it was a robot.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as artificial as that of an android.
meanings.sent5: The android's skin felt eerily lifelike to the touch.

meanings.definition: A mobile operating system developed by Google.
meanings.sent1: My new phone runs on the latest android version.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer android over other operating systems.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my android phone in the pool, and now it won't turn on.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a well-oiled android, processing information quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The android system offers a wide range of customization options for users.
